nodes.display_name: Tudo-Em-Um Esportivo VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
All in One sports VR oferece a maneira mais segura de mantê-lo saudável, tanto física quanto mentalmente, com contato zero.

# Basquete:
 Arremessos precisos com física realista da bola.
# Arco e flecha:
 Ajuste para o vento e acerte os alvos.
{472409315213932}
# Voleibol:
 Jogue 2 contra 2 em quadras profissionais.
# Bilhar:
 Domine os ângulos e a potência dos tiros.
{1169987717531179}
# Boliche:
 Faça strikes em pistas temáticas.
# Dardos:
 Jogue com amigos ou sozinho.
{1812066152637074}
# Tênis:
 Sacre, voleie e dê smash em quadras diferentes com física realista.
# Golfe:
 Jogue em campos únicos e aperfeiçoe seu swing.
{473567665011814}
# Squash:
 Partidas rápidas em quadras profissionais.
# Beisebol:
 Bata home runs e lance fastballs.
{878771274005029}
# Boxe:
 Lute em tempo real.
# Boxe Rítmico:
 Golpeie no ritmo da música para um treino energético.
# Saco Pesado:
 Pratique suas habilidades de boxe, melhore a velocidade e força.
{408651781934917}
# Tênis de Mesa:
 Reflexos rápidos e precisão são necessários.
{3725742211046430}
nodes.short_description: 13 esportes em um jogo! Que tipo de atividades esportivas serão mais seguras durante a era da pandemia? All in One sports VR oferece a maneira mais segura de mantê-lo saudável, tanto física quanto mentalmente, com contato zero.

nodes.display_name: 多合一运动 VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
13種體育運動在一個遊戲中！在疫情時期，哪種類型的體育活動更安全呢？多合一运动 VR 是保持身體和心理健康最安全的方法，無需接觸。我們的使命是為全球的體育愛好者提供逼真的沉浸式體育體驗，讓他們隨時隨地享受各種體育運動。

我們的使命是為全球的體育愛好者提供逼真的沉浸式體育體驗，讓他們隨時隨地享受各種體育運動。

# 篮球: 
征服虚拟现实篮球场。准确的投篮赢得胜利，体验真实球体物理带来的游戏刺激！

# 射箭:
在重视精确度的VR射箭场射箭。调整风向和距离，射中各种目标，争取最高分。独自或与朋友一起体验这个沉浸式游戏。
{1505059517109460}
# 排球:
加入专业场地的2对2排球比赛。对抗聪明的AI或真人玩家，成功发球、扣球和拦网。通过动态游戏物理感受每一次击球！

# 台球:
参与VR台球！调整击球角度和力度，战胜对手。体验仿真真实生活的物理引擎。
{981515969521318}
# 保龄球:
 调整角度和力度，在VR保龄球中打出完美一击。体验不同主题的保龄球馆。
# 飞镖:
 享受VR飞镖游戏，与朋友竞技或独自练习。
{2451092038414246}
# 网球:
 在VR网球中，土场、草地或硬地上发球、截击和重击，逼真的物理效果让每场比赛栩栩如生。
# 高尔夫:
 在VR高尔夫中，在独特的球场上完美挥杆，参加锦标赛。
{3666084200318558}
# 壁球:
 在专业场地上参与快节奏的VR壁球比赛。
# 棒球:
 在VR棒球中挥棒打出本垒打，投掷快球。在各种模式中竞争。
{464057252852101}
# 拳击:
 进入VR拳击场，实时进行拳击，躲闪和格挡。
# 节奏拳击:
 在节奏拳击VR中，随音乐节拍进行拳击，进行充满活力的锻炼。
# 沙袋:
 在VR中练习拳击技巧，提升速度和力。
{345670681456153}
# 乒乓球:
 参加VR乒乓球比赛，需要精确和快速反应。
nodes.short_description: 1场比赛13项运动！疫情时代，哪种运动会更安全？多合一运动 VR 提供了一种无需任何接触即可保持身心健康的最安全方式。

nodes.display_name: Tutto-In-Uno Sport VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
La realtà virtuale sportiva All in One offre il modo più sicuro per mantenerti in salute sia fisicamente che mentalmente senza contatto.






# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
# Pallacanestro:
 Tiri precisi con fisica realistica della palla.
# Tiro con l'arco:
 Regola il vento e colpisci i bersagli.
{1754821498345399}
# Pallavolo:
 2 contro 2 su campi professionali.
# Biliardo:
 Controlla angoli e potenza dei colpi.
{1808241633009943}
# Bowling:
 Strike in ambienti tematici.
# Freccette:
 Gioca da solo o con amici.
{417956661167135}
# Tennis:
 Servizi e smash su campi diversi, con fisica realistica.
# Golf:
 Percorsi unici, perfeziona il tuo swing.
{323254193885899}
# Squash:
 Match veloci su campi professionali.
# Baseball:
 Colpisci home run e lancia fastball.
{1007582340827568}
# Boxe:
 Combatti in tempo reale.
# Boxe Ritmica:
 Colpisci a ritmo di musica, allenamenti energici.
# Sacco Pesante:
 Migliora velocità e forza nel pugilato.
{2377806969087488}
# Ping Pong:
 Riflessi rapidi e precisione richiesti.
{983458943496047}
nodes.short_description: 13 sport in 1 gioco! Che tipo di attività sportive saranno più sicure durante l'era della pandemia? La realtà virtuale sportiva All in One offre il modo più sicuro per mantenerti in salute sia fisicamente che mentalmente senza contatto.

nodes.display_name: Tout-En-Un Sport VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
All in One sports VR offre le moyen le plus sûr de vous garder en bonne santé physiquement et mentalement sans contact.






# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
# Basketball: 
Tirs précis avec une physique réaliste du ballon.
# Tir à l'arc:
 Ajustez le vent et la distance pour atteindre les cibles.
{420116750737130}
# Volleyball: 
 Participez à des matchs 2 contre 2 sur des terrains professionnels.
# Billard: 
 Maîtrisez les angles et la puissance.
{1604610676999993}
# Bowling: 
 Réalisez des strikes dans des allées thématiques.
# Fléchettes: 
 Jouez seul ou avec des amis.
{357332470661267}
# Tennis: 
Servez, volleyez et smashez sur différents terrains avec une physique réaliste.
# Golf:
 Jouez sur des parcours uniques, perfectionnez votre swing.
{377182155316824}
# Squash:
 Matchs rapides sur des courts professionnels.
# Baseball:
 Frappez des home runs et lancez des fastballs.
{2153409245020428}
# Boxe: 
 Combattez en temps réel.
# Boxe rythmique:
 Frappez en rythme, entraînements énergiques.
# Sac lourd:
 Pratiquez vos compétences de boxe, améliorez vitesse et force.
{2833829860098056}
# PingPong:
 Réflexes rapides et précision nécessaires.shez contre des adversaires dans des environnements réalistes.
{1662562967835575}
nodes.short_description: 13 sports en 1 jeu! Quels types d'activités sportives seront plus sûrs pendant l'ère de la pandémie? All in One sports VR offre le moyen le plus sûr de vous garder en bonne santé physiquement et mentalement sans contact.

nodes.long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 


# Basketball: 
Conquer the VR basketball court and win with precise shots. Experience realistic ball physics!

# Archery: 
In VR archery, adjust for wind and distance to shoot arrows with precision and score high.
{3683892668554100}
# Volleyball: 
Enjoy a 2 vs 2 team volleyball game on a pro court. Compete against smart AI or real players for intense gameplay.

# Billiards:
 Play VR billiards, adjusting the angle and power of your shots to outsmart your opponent with a lifelike physics engine.
{1103977420875261}
# Bowling: 
For the perfect game in VR bowling, adjust the angle and strength and beat more pins than your opponent.

# Darts: 
Enjoy a VR darts game, competing with friends or practicing alone.
{1115816616311707}
# Tennis: 
Play VR tennis on clay, grass, or hard courts, serving, volleying, and smashing with realistic physics.

# Golf: 
Play VR golf on unique courses, perfecting your swing and competing in tournaments.
{1787233821756336}
# Squash: 
Engage in fast-paced VR squash, competing on a professional court.

# Baseball: 
Hit home runs and pitch fastballs in VR baseball, competing in various modes.
{1094861784931502}
# Boxing: 
Step into the VR boxing ring, punching, dodging, and blocking in real time.

# Beat Boxing: 
Exercise by punching to the music in Beat Boxing VR for an energetic workout.

# Heavy Bag: 
Practice boxing skills in VR, improving speed and strength.
{1469268270676746}
# PingPong: 
Play fast-paced VR table tennis, requiring precision and quick reflexes.
{1717934035403115}
nodes.short_description: 13 Sports in 1 Game ! What type of sports acitivities will be safer during the pandemic era? All in One sports VR offers the most safe way to keep you healthy for both physically and mentally with zero contact.

nodes.display_name: 多合一運動 VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
13種體育運動在一個遊戲中！在疫情時期，哪種類型的體育活動更安全呢？多合一運動 VR 是保持身體和心理健康最安全的方法，無需接觸。我們的使命是為全球的體育愛好者提供逼真的沉浸式體育體驗，讓他們隨時隨地享受各種體育運動。

我們的使命是為全球的體育愛好者提供逼真的沉浸式體育體驗，讓他們隨時隨地享受各種體育運動


# 籃球:
征服虛擬現實籃球場。準確的投籃贏得勝利，體驗真實球體物理帶來的遊戲刺激！

# 射箭:
在重視精準度的VR射箭場射箭。調整風向和距離，射中各種目標，爭取最高分。獨自或與朋友一起體驗這個沉浸式遊戲。
{1392670465459934}
# 排球:
加入專業場地的2對2排球比賽。對抗聰明的AI或真人玩家，成功發球、扣球和攔網。通過動態遊戲物理感受每一次擊球！

# 台球:
參與VR台球！調整擊球角度和力度，戰勝對手。體驗仿真真實生活的物理引擎。
{759234966311189}

# 保齡球:
 調整角度和力度，在虛擬現實保齡球中打出完美一擊。體驗不同主題的保齡球館。
# 飛鏢:
 享受虛擬現實飛鏢遊戲，與朋友競技或獨自練習。
{440033178616460}
# 網球:
 在虛擬現實網球中，土場、草地或硬地上發球、截擊和重擊，逼真的物理效果讓每場比賽栩栩如生。
# 高爾夫:
 在虛擬現實高爾夫中，在獨特的球場上完美揮桿，參加錦標賽。
{355177320882221}
# 壁球:
 在專業場地參與快節奏的虛擬現實壁球比賽。
# 棒球:
 在虛擬現實棒球中揮棒打出本壘打，投掷快球。在各種模式中競爭。
{373733498965962}
# 拳擊:
 進入虛擬現實拳擊場，實時進行拳擊，躲閃和格擋。
# 節奏拳擊:
 在節奏拳擊VR中，隨音樂節拍進行拳擊，進行充滿活力的鍛煉。
# 沙包:
 在虛擬現實中練習拳擊技巧，提升速度和力量。
{1170945977650067}
# 乒乓球:
 參加虛擬現實乒乓球比賽，需要精確和快速反應。
{1137565390611492}

nodes.display_name: オールインワン・スポーツ VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
 オールインワンスポーツVRは、身体的および精神的に健康を維持するための最も安全な方法を提供します。
#  バスケットボール:
 VRバスケットボールコートを制覇し、正確なショットで勝利を手に入れよう。リアルなボールの物理を体験！
#  アーチェリー:
 VRアーチェリーで風と距離を調整し、矢を正確に打ち、高得点を狙え。
{766021395295796}
# バレーボール:
 プロのコートで2対2のチームバレーボールを楽しもう。賢いAIまたは実際のプレイヤーとの激しいゲームを体験。
#  ビリヤード:
 VRビリヤードでショットの角度とパワーを調整し、リアルな物理エンジンで相手を出し抜こう。
{807931461212949}
#  ボウリング:
 VRボウリングで完璧なゲームのために角度と力を調節し、相手より多くのピンを倒して勝ってみてください。
#  ダーツ:
 VRダーツゲームを楽しみ、友達と競争したり、一人で練習しよう。
{1162280204765111}
# テニス:
 クレイ、グラス、ハードコートでVRテニスをプレイ。リアルな物理でサーブ、ボレー、スマッシュを楽しもう。
# ゴルフ:
 ユニークなコースでVRゴルフをプレイし、スイングを完璧にし、トーナメントで競争。
{459743243289302}
# スカッシュ:
 プロのコートで速いペースのVRスカッシュに挑戦。
# 野球:
 VR野球でホームランを打ち、ファストボールを投げよう。様々なモードで競争。
{756258796671927}
# ボクシング:
 VRボクシングリングでパンチ、回避、ブロックをリアルタイムで。
# ビートボクシング:
 ビートボクシングVRで音楽に合わせてパンチを打ち、エネルギッシュなワークアウトを体験。
# ヘビーバッグ:
 VRでボクシングスキルを練習し、速度と力を向上させよう。
{343045218790546}
# 卓球:
 素早い反応と正確さが求められるVR卓球をプレイしよう。
{450477520849238}
nodes.short_description: 1ゲームで13スポーツ！ パンデミックの時代には、どのような種類のスポーツ活動がより安全になりますか？ オールインワンスポーツVRは、身体的および精神的に健康を維持するための最も安全な方法を提供します。

nodes.display_name: Alles-In-Einem Sport VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
All in One Sport VR bietet die sicherste Möglichkeit, Sie körperlich und geistig ohne Kontakt gesund zu halten.
# Basketball:
 Präzise Würfe mit realistischer Ballphysik.
# Bogenschießen:
 Passe Wind und Distanz an, um Ziele zu treffen.
{806395764735778}
# Volleyball:
 2 gegen 2 auf professionellen Plätzen.
# Billard:
 Meistere Winkel und Kraft deiner Stöße.
{441097381838616}
# Bowling:
 Erziele Strikes in thematischen Bowlingbahnen.
# Darts:
 Spiele alleine oder mit Freunden.
{375576988791761}
# Tennis:
 Serve, Volley und Smash auf verschiedenen Plätzen mit realer Physik.
# Golf:
 Spiele auf einzigartigen Kursen und perfektioniere deinen Schwung.
{1101731514464769}
# Squash:
 Schnelle Matches auf Profi-Courts.
# Baseball:
 Schlage Home Runs und wirf Fastballs.
{783764303711020}
# Boxen:
 Kämpfe in Echtzeit im Ring.
# Beat-Boxing:
 Kombiniere Fitness und Rhythmus, schlage im Takt der Musik.

 Trainiere deine Box-Fähigkeiten, verbessere Geschwindigkeit und Kraft.
{3176889522442249}
# Tischtennis:
 Schnelle Reflexe und Präzision erforderlich.
{1816400908772735}
nodes.short_description: 13 Sportarten in 1 Spiel! Welche Art von Sportaktivitäten wird während der Pandemie sicherer sein? All in One Sport VR bietet die sicherste Möglichkeit, Sie körperlich und geistig ohne Kontakt gesund zu halten.

nodes.display_name: Все-В-Одном Cпорт VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
All in One Sports VR предлагает самый безопасный способ сохранить здоровье как физически, так и морально без каких-либо контактов.
# Баскетбол:

{482873167397178}
# Волейбол:

 Управляйте углами и силой ударов.
{414536691372137}
# Боулинг:
 Страйк в боулинге VR с тематическими дорожками.
# Дартс: 
 Играйте с друзьями или в одиночку.
{1572360096953014} 
# Теннис:
 Игра на различных кортах с реалистической физикой.
# Гольф:
 Играйте на полях с уникальными препятствиями.
{407343925539553}
# Сквош:
 Быстрые матчи на профессиональном корте.
# Бейсбол:

{809175093957297}
# Бокс:

# Бит-боксинг:

{435999522395738}

{1114544973147953}

{1888230791635710}
nodes.short_description: 13 sporten in 1 spel! Welke sportactiviteiten zijn veiliger tijdens het pandemietijdperk? All in One Sports VR biedt de meest veilige manier om je fysiek en mentaal gezond te houden zonder contact.

nodes.display_name: 올인원 스포츠 VR/All In One Sports VR
nodes.long_description:
# ★ Discode Link:  https://discord.gg/cAJShemkw2 
 비대면 가상현실 스포츠를 안전하고 리얼하게 즐길 수있는 최고의 선택입니다.
# 농구:
 VR 농구 코트를 정복하고 정확한 슛으로 승리를 쟁취하세요. 현실적인 물리학을 경험하세요!

# 양궁:
 VR 양궁장에서 바람과 거리를 조정하며 정밀한 화살 발사로 높은 점수를 획득하세요.
{950476890121671}
# 배구:
 프로 코트에서 2대2 팀 배구 게임을 즐기세요. 스마트 AI나 실제 플레이어와 경쟁하며 강렬한 게임을 체험하세요.

# 당구:
 VR 당구에서 각도와 힘을 조절해 상대를 이기세요. 현실적인 물리 엔진을 경험할 수 있습니다.
{1164848244657766}
# 볼링:
 VR 볼링에서 완벽한 게임을 위해 각도와 힘을 조절하고 상대 보다 많은 핀을 쓰려뜨려 이겨보세요.
# 다트:
 VR 다트 게임을 즐기며 친구들과 경쟁하거나 혼자 연습하세요.
{7487515334694797}
# 테니스:
 VR 테니스에서 클레이, 잔디, 하드 코트에서 서브, 발리, 스매시를 즐기세요. 리얼리스틱한 물리학으로 각 경기가 생생해집니다.

# 골프:
 VR 골프에서 독특한 코스에서 완벽한 스윙을 선보이고 토너먼트에서 경쟁하세요.
{1146402179936309}
 # 스쿼시:
 VR 스쿼시 게임에서 빠른 속도로 전문 코트에서 상대와 대결하세요.

# 야구:
 VR 야구에서 홈런을 치고 패스트볼을 던지세요. 다양한 게임 모드에서 경쟁하세요.
{7467349703349905}
# 복싱:
 VR 복싱 링에서 실시간으로 펀치, 회피, 방어를 하며 훈련하세요.

# 비트 복싱:
 음악에 맞춰 펀치를 날리며 운동하세요. 에너지 넘치고 도전적인 운동을 경험하세요.

# 헤비백:
 VR에서 복싱 기술을 연습하고 속도와 힘을 향상시키세요.
{393496316993630}
# 탁구:
 빠른 속도의 VR 탁구에서 정밀도와 빠른 반응이 요구되는 경기를 즐기세요.
{1348979475793301}
nodes.short_description: 13 가지 스포츠게임을 '올인원 스포츠 VR' 하나로 ! 13 개의 인기 스포츠 게임을 하나의 타이틀로 통합 개발하였습니다. 비대면 가상현실 스포츠를 안전하고 리얼하게 즐길 수있는 최고의 선택입니다.

nodes.long_description:
■ A variety of sports titles experiences
- Baseball, Archery, Ping Pong, Basketball, Bowling, Badminton, Golf, Dart, Billiard, Boxing

■ Real time PvP by multiplay
- boxing, baseball and table tennis are not yet supported

■ Realistic virtual sports experiences by advanced physics

■ Player customization

■ Simple UI and easy control can help anyone to play

■ 5 different difficulties from beginner to professional

* The game format is the same as the official Olympic rules, so you can learn sports training and rules.
* Suitable for virtual reality sports classrooms that must be conducted indoors due to physical education facilities and weather conditions.
nodes.short_description: 10 Sports in 1 Game ! What type of sports acitivities will be safer during the pandemic era? All in One sports VR offers the most safe way to keep you healthy for both physically and mentally with zero contact.

nodes.change_log:
1.3.1 Hotfix Update Details
Badminton

Fixed a bug where players could catch the shuttlecock after serving.
Bowling/Archery

Changed the UI text color for better readability.
Boxing

Resolved the lighting issue with the mini-game gloves.
We hope these updates make your gameplay experience smoother and more enjoyable. We always welcome your feedback and appreciate your continuous support and love for our game. We will continue to do our best to provide you with an even better gaming experience.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
The All-In-One Sports VR Team

1.3.0 Version Update!!

Hello, dear players!

We are excited to bring you a brand new update that will make your gaming experience even more diverse and enjoyable. In this update, we have added amazing Cosmetics for the tools and balls you need to play the game!

General Improvements

Matching System Improvements
Reduced Random Matching Wait Time
If the wait time for random matching becomes too long, the system will now automatically match you with an AI opponent. Enjoy faster matchmaking for a seamless gaming experience.

Timeout Loss Penalty
Players will automatically be considered defeated if they exceed the time limit twice during a game. This ensures smooth and fair gameplay.

New Tool Cosmetics
Achieve various milestones in each category and earn new cosmetics! Enjoy a more exciting gameplay experience.
Equip the new Cosmetics and show off your amazing style in the game!

examples:
Table Tennis: Score 100 points with smashes
Boxing: Knock down opponents 100 times
Archery: Win 10 shoot-offs

Spectator Cheering Tools Update
We have added two new cheering tools for spectators: the Lightsaber and Fireworks. Enhance your spectator mode experience by using these diverse cheering tools to show your support and excitement!



Specific Game Updates

Table Tennis
Rally Scoring Rule Change
During a rally, if the opponent hits the ball and it does not hit the table but you return it, the opponent will lose the point.
Serve Spin Adjustment
The spin strength of serves has been reduced by 50%, making serves easier to handle.

Badminton
Serve Rule Adjustment
Previously, you had to hold the shuttlecock before serving, but now you can serve without holding it, allowing for more dynamic play.

Baseball
Changed the pitching mechanics.

Darts
Added a rule where a player loses if they timeout twice in a multiplayer game.

Billiards
Removed the UI that shows ball-related information to make multiplayer games more challenging.
Fixed the issue with the cue ball's hit point location.
Restored the missing trackpad movements.
Added a rule where a player loses if they timeout twice in a multiplayer game.


Boxing
Added a vibration animation when the health bar decreases.
Improved the camera tracking of the health bar for smoother movement.




We strive to provide a more enjoyable and seamless gaming experience by incorporating your feedback. Discover the new features and improvements in this update!

Thank you.

[ Appnori Inc. ]

1.2.2 Version Update!!

Hello, dear players!

Thank you for your continuous love and enjoyment of our game. In this update, we have made the following changes:

● Spectator Mode
1. Added various cheering tools: CheeringSticks, MagicSticks, and Vuvuzela
2. You can switch between the tools by moving the controller stick up or down.

● Squash
1. Fixed a bug where the ball was not hit properly in multiplayer, addressing an issue with ball reaction.
2. Corrected inaccuracies in scoring judgments.
3. Improved overall game performance for smoother gameplay.

● Billiards
1. Updated the progress UI graphics for better visualization.

● Golf
1. Added a new ball camera feature for more accurate tracking of the golf ball's movement.

● Bowling
1. Fixed an issue where the results screen would not appear after completing a game.

● Baseball
1. Updated the home run scoreboard animation.
2. Corrected a bug where first and third basemen would make catches while airborne.
3. Fixed an issue where the game would not end in the top of the 9th inning when leading.
4. Addressed the problem of the game not continuing if the pitcher threw the ball behind the catcher.

1.2.2 Version Update!!

● Spectator Mode

1. We have added various cheering tools for spectator mode:
Cheering balloons, cheering sticks, cheering trumpets

● Squash Changes

1. Fixed a bug where the ball was not being hit properly in multiplayer
Addressed an issue where the ball would not react correctly in certain multiplayer situations.

2. Fixed a bug where the scoring was incorrect
Corrected inaccuracies in scoring judgments.

3. Optimized game progression
Improved overall game performance for smoother gameplay.

● Billiards

1. Changed the current progress UI graphics
Updated the UI graphics for better visualization of game progress.

● Golf

1. Added ball tracking camera
Added a new tracking camera feature to more accurately follow the movement of the golf ball.

● Bowling

1. Fixed an issue where the results screen would not appear even after completing the game
Resolved the problem where the results screen would not display after finishing a game.

●Baseball
1. Changed the home run scoreboard animation
Updated the animation that plays on the scoreboard when a home run is hit.

2. Fixed an issue where the first and third basemen would catch the ball in mid-air
Corrected the bug where first and third basemen would make catches while airborne.

3. Fixed an issue where the game would not end in the top of the 9th inning when winning
Fixed the problem of the game not ending when leading in the top of the 9th inning.

4. Fixed an issue where the game would not progress if the pitcher threw the ball behind the catcher
Addressed the issue where the game would not continue if the pitcher threw the ball behind the catcher.
